Performer:
Yoshida Shōjirō (吉田昇二郎)

Dates: '1967-1975/11'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994); Dejitaru bunka raiburarī (Japan Arts Council)


1/1 – Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

May 1969: The Story of Priest Roben

September 1969: The Battle of Sakamoto Castle

February 1970: The Battles of Genji and Heike

April 1970: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

May 1970: Yoshitsune and a Thousand Cherry Trees

September 1970: Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy

November 1970: The Nunobiki Waterfall
